column5: Investment and financial risk is a highly competitive sector and our course will give you the IT and research skills that employers demand.This course is ideal if you aspire to create and manage investment portfolios, using real-life examples with the latest research and theories.This course has been developed with input from professionals at RBS, Commerzbank, Standard Chartered Bank and NatWest.You will use industry-standard databases, learning to analyse and explore topics using qualitative and quantitative methods.This course is suitable for both experienced corporate finance and financial management practitioners who want to add to their skills, and those looking for a career in the area.
